name: Codename:PRESENT
description:
Its a game made for ExtraCredits holiday game jam(2nd EC jam).

In this game we focused on granting player upgrades(gifts)

as often as to keep him engaged in game. 

Game is inspired by metroidvania games where you are getting permanent upgrades but it is also peaceful platformer(no enemies) so mechanics of your gameplay constantly change. 

It is also short(it will take more for casual players of course but someone who is playing platformers from time to time will finish it in less than 10 minutes), but satisfaction of progress that player made will be big enough that he will eventually  like the game.

Controll scheme is simple:

ARROW KEYS - MOVE

Z - RUN (UPGRADE)

X - JUMP 

C - DASH (UPGRADE)

A - PLACE BLOCK BELOW YOURSELF (UPGRADE)

S - ACTIVATE ICE WALKING SHOES (UPGRADE)

TAB - HELP WINDOW
